srl_nokia-interfaces-nbr:neighbor-discov._annotate_stale-time: 30 seconds lower than age-time in mac-vrf, to avoid transient packet loss when MAC address of ARP/ND entry is removed

ethernet-segment.name: mc-lag1
ethernet-segment._annotate_esi: EVPN MC-LAG with ('1.1.0.2', [1]), bytes 2-7 form auto-derived route target see RFC7432 7.6

ethernet-segment.name: mc-lag3
ethernet-segment._annotate_esi: EVPN MC-LAG with ('1.1.0.2', [3]), bytes 2-7 form auto-derived route target see RFC7432 7.6

ethernet-segment.name: mc-lag4
ethernet-segment._annotate_esi: EVPN MC-LAG with ('1.1.0.2', [4]), bytes 2-7 form auto-derived route target see RFC7432 7.6

srl_nokia-bgp:bgp._annotate_autonomous-system: this is the overlay AS, (also) used for auto-derived RT

route-target._annotate: Special RT/RD for EVPN LAG coordination

vxlan-interface.name: vxlan0.10001
vxlan-interface._annotate: This is symmetric IRB with a L3 VXLAN interface and EVPN RT5 routes

srl_nokia-bgp-evpn:bgp-instance._annotate_evi: Note: value affects DF election in case of multi-homing
